name: Spacecraft (ARTG 80G)
description:
BY NILE IMTIAZ

: : About Spacecraft : :
A game for 2 to 4 players. Collect parts of three types to build a spaceship, each with varying stats and abilities. Use your ship to move around the board and complete 1 lap, or be the last player standing by attacking and destroying all others' ships.

: : Link to Tabletopia Playzone : :
https://tabletopia.com/playground/spacecraft-5nzjag/play-now
